code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'../CustomCursor.css';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomCursor=()=>{const[position,setPosition]=useState({x:0,y:0});const[isClicking,setIsClicking]=useState(false);const[isVisible,setIsVisible]=useState(false);const[isPointer,setIsPointer]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const isTouchDevice='ontouchstart'in window||navigator.maxTouchPoints>0||navigator.msMaxTouchPoints>0;if(isTouchDevice){setIsVisible(false);return;}setIsVisible(true);const updatePosition=e=>{setPosition({x:e.clientX,y:e.clientY});};const handleMouseDown=()=>setIsClicking(true);const handleMouseUp=()=>setIsClicking(false);const handleCursorStyle=()=>{const target=document.elementFromPoint(position.x,position.y);setIsPointer(window.getComputedStyle(target).cursor==='pointer');};document.addEventListener('mousemove',updatePosition);document.addEventListener('mousemove',handleCursorStyle);document.addEventListener('mousedown',handleMouseDown);document.addEventListener('mouseup',handleMouseUp);return()=>{document.removeEventListener('mousemove',updatePosition);document.removeEventListener('mousemove',handleCursorStyle);document.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleMouseDown);document.removeEventListener('mouseup',handleMouseUp);};},[position.x,position.y]);if(!isVisible)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`cursor-dot ${isClicking?'clicking':''} ${isPointer?'pointer':''}`,style:{left:`${position.x}px`,top:`${position.y}px`}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`cursor-outline ${isClicking?'clicking':''} ${isPointer?'pointer':''}`,style:{left:`${position.x}px`,top:`${position.y}px`}})]});};export default CustomCursor;
